item.description: SINGLES MOVIE EVENING at the Showcase Cinema Theater in Berlin. We'll meet at 6:30 pm in the lobby before the movies start. Everyone decides which movie they want to see. After the movies, we'll go nearby for refreshments. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 19 Frontage Road: Rt. 84 to Rt. 9S, go 4-5 miles to Exit 22 (Mill Street), end of ramp turn left, next light turn left, theater 1/4 mile on right OR I 91 to Rt. 9N, go about 2-3 miles to Exit 21 (Rt. 372 East Berlin), end of ramp turn right onto Rt. 372W, go straight about 2 miles, just past Rt. 9N entrance ramp, theater on right.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside holding a Social Connections sign.
item.why: You'll enjoy being with other singles, seeing a new movie, and sharing refreshments with everyone later.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Movie Evening
